Fast Food games We have 6 completed fast food games
Fast Food
Foods and drinks in the machine are disordered. Clients will come to buy. You have to orders them quickly or your boss will fired you.
Tags: fast food , tetris , food , kfc
231 yupis
H. K. Cafe
You're working in a restaurant. There, you have to prepare and deliver every order that the clients want. If you burn them or make a mistake, you'll lose your job; but if you do it right, you'll get a good money.
Tags: restaurants , work , food , fast food
35 yupis
Ready Pizza
Carla prepares the best pizza of all Italy.Today she has a lot of orders and has hired you to help her. You must use the right ingredients to get delicious pizza.
Tags: girls , fruit , food , pizza
33 yupis
Uncle Scrooge Stall
Walt Disney characters have arrived at a restaurant; you should attend to their orders quickly so that they'll be contented. Do it quickly and don't let them get angry or your business will fail.
Tags: disney , restaurants , kids , work
28 yupis
Takeaway Jake
Jake works in the School Dining Room. Boys ask for different meals and drinks. Help him to works quickly without any mistake. Good luck!
Tags: work , skill , kids , food
22 yupis
Burger Time
You're a chef and you're working in a fast food restaurant. You were cooking when suddenly, the eggs and sausages started attacking you. To defend yourself, you must prepare the hamburgers as fast as you can.
Tags: pursuits , work , food , labyrinth
18 yupis

Serve the Hot Dogs
It's summer and you want to earn a lot of money. It occurred to you to sell hotdogs and hamburgers on the beach. You should satisfy all of your customers by attending to them well.

Fast Food
You work in a fast food restaurant. Your objective is to correctly select all the fast foods that the customers ask to give them as quickly as possible.

Total Exhaustion
The person in charge of making the hamburgers has fallen asleep. You are his best friend and you'll help him with his work so that he doesn't get fired. You should attend to the orders of your clients. Make the right hamburgers and your friend will appreciate it.
Tags: skill , kids , work , food
